## PlayerCamera.setFilmOffset() method

Sets the film offset of the camera. A positive value shifts the camera right, a negative value shifts it left.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setFilmOffset(filmOffset: number): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

filmOffset


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The film offset to set.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
